dsiter.writer

Class CsvWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsiter.writer.CsvWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWriter

    public class CsvWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWriter
    An implementation of IWriter that writes an iterator as CSV.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CsvWriter()
      Construct a CsvWriter with default parameters; equivalent to new CsvWriter(",", "\n", true)
      CsvWriter(java.lang.String columnSeparator, java.lang.String lineSeparator, boolean writeHeader)
      Construct a CsvWriter with the given columnSeparator and lineSeparator; if writeHeader is true, then output a header as the first line.

      Write the passed iterator to outStream as CSV

    • Constructor Detail

      • CsvWriter

        public CsvWriter()
        Construct a CsvWriter with default parameters; equivalent to new CsvWriter(",", "\n", true)

      • CsvWriter

        public CsvWriter(java.lang.String columnSeparator,
                 java.lang.String lineSeparator,
                 boolean writeHeader)
        Construct a CsvWriter with the given columnSeparator and lineSeparator; if writeHeader is true, then output a header as the first line.
        Parameters:
        columnSeparator - The column separtor to use
        lineSeparator - The line separator to use
        writeHeader - If true, write a header as the first line, else only write data lines.
